text: Znayutʹ shcho tse svitovo zhyttya ni bilʹsh nizh hra ta ihry, ta khvastayuchi sered vas, ta nakopychennya hroshey ta ditey. Tse vyhlyadaye yak abundant doshch shcho vyroblyaye zavody ta zadovolʹnyaye disbelievers. Ale todi obih zavodiv u daremne sino, ta duyutʹsya daleko vitrom. U U maybutnʹomu ye abo suvoryy retribution, abo forgiveness z BOHA ta skhvalennya. Tse svitovo zhyttya ne ye bilʹsh nizh tymchasova ilyuziya
